snippet: Melicia Pristell grew up estranged from her father and spent a year in a homeless shelter, but they rebuilt their relationship before his death.
abstract: Community Service Society, one of the seven agencies supported by The New York Times Neediest Cases Fund, helps Melicia Pristell of Brooklyn buy a laptop as she returns to classes at Medgar Evers College.
lead_paragraph: Melicia Pristell grew up estranged from her father and spent a year in a homeless shelter, but they rebuilt their relationship before his death.

headline.main: After the Death of Her Father, She Fights Her Way Back to College
headline.print_headline: After a Death, a Fight to Return to College

keywords.value: New York Times Neediest Cases Fund
